DOC.brief_summary: 1. To compare the efficacy of 1. Short Daily Hemodialysis 2. Online HDF in term of adequacy of dialysis.
DOC.brief_title: Short Daily Hemodialysis and Online HDF: Which One is Better?
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators intend to compare the efficacy between these modalities of treatment in terms of adequacy and also other parameters such as calcium-phosphorus balance and hematocrit
DOC.criteria: stable ESRD KT/V > 1.2 for thrice weekly or > 1.8 for twice weekly Inadequate vascular access flow rate Concurrent medical illnesses History of noncompliance
